product_name: BRU Gold Instant Coffee, 100g: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: Excellent aroma and taste of coffee!
reviews.review_body: I was a Nescafe brand coffee lover, but I switched to Bru Gold for about a year now and I am highly satisfied.Pros:1 Attractive traingular glass  bottle packaging.2 Strong aroma of coffee which gives you satisfaction of drinking a cup of coffee.3 Other uses of coffee: If you want to enhance flavour of chocolate desserts, then use this coffee along with chocolate powder/cocoa while preparing chocolate cake, muffins, hot chocolate, chocolate icecream.Cons:1 Expensive brand of coffee but it is worth the price.2 Personal experience: It is strong coffee so avoid drinking this coffee during night time. It might affect your sleep.Verdict:Buy this coffee during some good deals or pantry sale. Definite recommend for coffee lovers! ‚òïIf you find my review helpful, please click the YES/HELPFUL button! üëç

reviews.review_title: Do not buy coffee on sale
reviews.review_body: No coffee aroma at all. But of burnt soot and chocolate. Drinking it is almost like drinking ashes. Amazon sold this at 5% discount. Now I know why they were so keen on getting rid of this stock.This deserves a negative 5 stars.
Been using this coffee for some time now. It has a nice aroma and tastes good. I generally have it black, but with milk too it tastes nice
When I opened it from the box the bottle was broken from the top and pieces of glasses were shattered in the bottle itself. Never expected such product receiving

Through online buy we try to save time and money. But for the said item I will definitely say it is just waste of time and money. I have received the broken item which is useless with the broken glass pieces with the coffee and the item cannot be returned.

Seeing few review , I was worried about packing but when I got I was really impressed by the packing nothing damage , got a very nice deal . And for product bru is my favourite . Definitely should try üëçüëçüëçüíØ

reviews.review_title: Amazon charged me more than the MRP ! That's horrible!
reviews.review_body: The taste is not as rich as Nescaf√©.Bru has a smokey flavour to it and tastes slightly different. It's not for hard-core coffee fans. Amazon charged me 257/- whereas the MRP is 245/- !!!
The seal was opened, prima face the bottle was tampered and unfit for consumption. Manufacturing date ad MRP concealed with sticker. Actually this product deserve - Star.
